Pre-Game Insights: Sunil Chhetri will hang up his boots for the national side after the FIFA World Cup qualifier match against Kuwait at the Salt Lake Stadium on Thursday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The venue is a lucky one as well with the Indian team not having lost in the Salt Lake Stadium since August 2006.
Others: A win would put India in a comfortable position to advance to the third round of the World Cup qualifiers and will be a fitting farewell to the legend who has scored 94 goals for the Blue Tigers in 150 appearances.
